title: Jim Carrey
summary: James Eugene Carrey (born January 17, 1962)[2] is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, writer, and producer. Known for his energetic slapstick performances,[3] Carrey first gained recognition in 1990, after landing a recurring role in the American sketch comedy television series In Living Color (1990â€“1994). He broke out as star in motion pictures with Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, The Mask and Dumb and Dumber (all 1994). This was followed up with Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, Batman Forever (both 1995), and Liar Liar (1997).
